name: Rideshare Platform
description: Complete project plan for building a rideshare or carpooling platform

issues.title: Set up user authentication system
issues.body:
## Description
Implement secure user authentication with email/phone verification.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Email/phone registration
- [ ] Password authentication
- [ ] Social login (Google, Facebook)
- [ ] Session management
- [ ] Password reset flow

## Technical Notes
- Use OAuth 2.0 for social logins
- Implement JWT tokens
- Rate limiting for auth endpoints

issues.title: Create user profile management
issues.body:
## Description
Build user profile system with personal information and preferences.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Profile creation and editing
- [ ] Profile photo upload
- [ ] Phone number verification
- [ ] Preference settings
- [ ] Driver/rider mode toggle

## Technical Notes
- Image optimization for uploads
- Store personal data securely

issues.title: Build ride request/offer creation interface
issues.body:
## Description
Create UI for posting and browsing rides.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Ride posting form
- [ ] Date/time picker
- [ ] Location autocomplete
- [ ] Seat capacity selector
- [ ] Price input

## Technical Notes
- Mobile-responsive design
- Google Maps API integration
- Real-time validation

issues.title: Implement ride matching algorithm
issues.body:
## Description
Develop algorithm to match riders with drivers based on routes and timing.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Route matching logic
- [ ] Time window matching
- [ ] Distance calculations
- [ ] Preference matching
- [ ] Real-time updates

## Technical Notes
- Use geospatial indexing
- Optimize for performance
- Consider traffic patterns

issues.title: Create in-app messaging system
issues.body:
## Description
Build messaging for coordinating ride details.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Real-time chat
- [ ] Push notifications
- [ ] Read receipts
- [ ] Image sharing
- [ ] Message history

## Technical Notes
- WebSocket for real-time
- Store messages securely
- Rate limiting

issues.title: Integrate payment processing
issues.body:
## Description
Integrate payment system for ride payments.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Payment method storage
- [ ] Cost calculation
- [ ] Payment processing
- [ ] Transaction history
- [ ] Refund handling

## Technical Notes
- Use Stripe or similar
- PCI compliance required
- Handle payment failures

issues.title: Build ride booking and confirmation flow
issues.body:
## Description
Create the flow for booking rides and confirming matches.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Booking request system
- [ ] Driver acceptance/rejection
- [ ] Automatic confirmations
- [ ] Booking modifications
- [ ] Cancellation handling

## Technical Notes
- Real-time notifications
- Handle concurrent bookings
- Timeout logic for responses

phases.name: Phase 2: Trust & Safety
phases.description: Build trust and ensure user safety

issues.title: Implement identity verification system
issues.body:
## Description
Add identity verification for drivers and riders.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Document upload (ID, license)
- [ ] Verification workflow
- [ ] Verification badges
- [ ] Manual review process
- [ ] Rejection handling

## Technical Notes
- OCR for document reading
- Secure document storage
- Third-party verification API

issues.title: Create rating and review system
issues.body:
## Description
Build reputation system for drivers and riders.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Star rating (1-5)
- [ ] Written reviews
- [ ] Review moderation
- [ ] Rating calculations
- [ ] Review responses

## Technical Notes
- Prevent fake reviews
- Calculate average ratings
- Flag inappropriate content

issues.title: Add emergency safety features
issues.body:
## Description
Implement safety features for ride participants.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Emergency contacts
- [ ] Share trip details
- [ ] Safety check-ins
- [ ] Emergency button (911)
- [ ] Live location sharing

## Technical Notes
- GPS tracking
- Quick emergency response
- Privacy considerations

issues.title: Implement data encryption and security
issues.body:
## Description
Ensure all sensitive data is properly encrypted.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Database encryption
- [ ] HTTPS/TLS setup
- [ ] API security
- [ ] Secure file storage
- [ ] Regular security audits

## Technical Notes
- Use industry standards
- Key management
- Regular penetration testing

issues.title: Build reporting and moderation system
issues.body:
## Description
Create system for reporting issues and moderating users.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Report submission
- [ ] Report categories
- [ ] Admin review panel
- [ ] User suspension/banning
- [ ] Appeal process

## Technical Notes
- Automated flagging
- Moderation queue
- Action logging

issues.title: Add recurring ride scheduling
issues.body:
## Description
Allow users to set up recurring rides (e.g., daily commutes).

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Recurring schedule creation
- [ ] Automatic matching
- [ ] Schedule modifications
- [ ] Cancellation handling
- [ ] Smart notifications

## Technical Notes
- Cron-based scheduling
- Handle schedule conflicts
- Flexible recurrence patterns

issues.title: Implement route optimization with multiple stops
issues.body:
## Description
Optimize routes when picking up multiple riders.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Multi-stop routing
- [ ] Time estimates
- [ ] Cost adjustments
- [ ] Visual route display
- [ ] Alternative routes

## Technical Notes
- Use Google Directions API
- Traffic consideration
- Optimize for efficiency

issues.title: Build analytics dashboard for users
issues.body:
## Description
Show users their ride statistics and insights.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Ride history
- [ ] Cost savings calculator
- [ ] Carbon footprint reduction
- [ ] Personal statistics
- [ ] Export data

## Technical Notes
- Data visualization
- Privacy controls
- Performance optimization

issues.title: Add driver earnings tracking
issues.body:
## Description
Create earnings dashboard for drivers.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Real-time earnings
- [ ] Payout schedule
- [ ] Tax documents
- [ ] Earnings breakdown
- [ ] Payment history

## Technical Notes
- Financial reporting
- Tax compliance
- Secure data handling

issues.title: Implement push notifications and alerts
issues.body:
## Description
Create comprehensive notification system.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Ride requests
- [ ] Booking confirmations
- [ ] Trip updates
- [ ] Payment notifications
- [ ] Promotional messages

## Technical Notes
- Firebase Cloud Messaging
- Notification preferences
- Rate limiting

issues.title: Add vehicle management for drivers
issues.body:
## Description
Allow drivers to manage multiple vehicles.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Vehicle registration
- [ ] Insurance verification
- [ ] Vehicle photos
- [ ] Multiple vehicle support
- [ ] Vehicle preferences

## Technical Notes
- Document verification
- Vehicle database
- Insurance validation

issues.title: Complete comprehensive testing suite
issues.body:
## Description
Develop and execute full testing coverage.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Unit tests (80%+ coverage)
- [ ] Integration tests
- [ ] E2E tests
- [ ] Security testing
- [ ] Performance testing
- [ ] Load testing

## Technical Notes
- Automated test pipeline
- CI/CD integration

issues.title: Create user documentation and help center
issues.body:
## Description
Write comprehensive user documentation.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] User guides
- [ ] Video tutorials
- [ ] FAQ section
- [ ] Troubleshooting guide
- [ ] Safety guidelines

## Technical Notes
- Searchable help center
- Multiple formats
- Regular updates

issues.title: Set up monitoring and alerting
issues.body:
## Description
Implement production monitoring systems.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Application monitoring
- [ ] Error tracking
- [ ] Performance metrics
- [ ] Uptime monitoring
- [ ] Alert configuration

## Technical Notes
- Use Datadog/New Relic
- Set SLA thresholds
- On-call rotation

issues.title: Prepare deployment and rollout plan
issues.body:
## Description
Create detailed deployment strategy.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Deployment checklist
- [ ] Rollback procedures
- [ ] Phased rollout plan
- [ ] Success metrics
- [ ] Communication plan

## Technical Notes
- Blue-green deployment
- Gradual rollout
- Feature flags

issues.title: Set up customer support system
issues.body:
## Description
Create support infrastructure for user assistance.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Support ticket system
- [ ] Knowledge base
- [ ] Live chat option
- [ ] Email support
- [ ] Response time SLAs

## Technical Notes
- Support tool integration
- Training materials
- Escalation procedures

issues.title: Launch marketing and user acquisition
issues.body:
## Description
Develop marketing content and acquisition strategy.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Landing page
- [ ] Social media presence
- [ ] Referral program
- [ ] App store optimization
- [ ] Launch campaign

## Technical Notes
- Analytics tracking
- A/B testing
- Growth metrics
